Poise [i](As your combat begins, choose whether all permanents you control with poise are composed or compelled until your next combat.)[/i]
[b]Composed[/b] Level 2
When Cryptmask Stalker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
[b]Compelled[/b] Level 3
Cryptmask Stalker has Deathtouch.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
When Gliding Frostweaver enters, if all other creatures you control are tapped, untap them. If all other creatures you control are untapped, they get +1/+1 until end of turn.

Whenever another nontoken creature you control enters, you may rehearse 1. If you do, untap Genasi Jewel Conductor and put a +1/+1 counter on it. [i](To rehearse, tap another untapped creature or artifact you control.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“I will not raise my hand in battle. I raise it in symphony, and armies move.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if all creatures you control are untapped, put a +1/+1 counter on one of them. If they are all tapped, draw a card instead.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Do not resist the rhythm. Let the tide carry you, and you will never falter.” —Lady Thalyra, Accord Virtuoso[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Debut [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, it has the spotlight until another creature you control takes it.)[/i]
Whenever another creature you control dies, if it had the spotlight, Razerwire Walker takes the spotlight.
Razerwire Walker has double strike as long as it has the spotlight.

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, if it had the spotlight, create a treasure token.
Whenever Carnival Detonator attacks, you may sacrifice an artifact. When you do, Carnival Detonator deals 2 damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Laughter is the fuse. Boom is the punchline.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature has ward {2}.
Exile equipped creature, sacrifice this artifact: Return that creature to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step. When you do, tap up to one target untapped creature and put a stun counter on it.
Equip {1}
When you sacrifice this artifact, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Grand Opera House enters tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The third was planned by steady, delicate hands.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature has menace.
Whenever equipped creature becomes blocked, you may sacrifice this artifact. If you do, it deals X damage to each blocking creature where X is the equipped creature's power.
Equip {2}
When you sacrifice this artifact, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Carnival of Souls enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]And the fifth was forged from reckless joy and chaos.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Target creature you control takes the spotlight.
Destroy target creature. Twist of the Knife deals damage to that creature's controller equal to its mana value.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“One for me and another for my critics.”[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature dies, you may cast another creature card from your graveyard. If you do, it costs {1} less to cast and enters tapped.
cards.flavor_text: [i]It doesn't remember what it once was, but longs for what it is yet to become.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
Whenever you bereave, create a 1/1 black and green Insect Drone creature token. Do this only once each turn.
Whenever a token creature you control dies, bereave. [i](To bereave, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, it's abilities trigger as though it died.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature card was put into exile from your graveyard this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature.

Equipped creature has deathtouch.
When equipped creature dies, you may sacrifice Nirvana Masque. If you do, return that creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield under your control.
Equip {1}
When you sacrifice Nirvana Masque, you may return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Twilight Echelon enters tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The fourth was woven from breathless bargains.[/i]

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of your end step, if you've advanced this turn, create a 1/1 red and white Soldier creature token. [i](You've advanced if a creature's power increased under your control this turn.)[/i]

Whenever you cast your first creature spell this turn, other creatures you control get +1/+0.
Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell this turn, you gain 2 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]No battle hymn carries farther than the steady pulse of a Haloheart drum.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Equipped creature has first strike.
Whenever equipped creature and at least two other creatures attack, you may sacrifice Parade Masque. When you do, equipped creature gets +1/+1 and gains double strike until end of turn.
Equip {2}
When you sacrifice Parade Masque, you may return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Parade Grounds enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
cards.flavor_text2: [i]The second was carved of devotion and passion.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1}{R}, {T}: Parade Baton deals 2 damage to target opponent.
{1}{W}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“The crowd cheers, the drums thunder, and with a single flourish we remind Brimwreath who leads the march of the revel.”
—Captain of the Haloheart Guard[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Illuminate {3} [i]({3}, put a moonlight counter on this creature, unlocking the text in brackets. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Vigilance, [b][hexproof]
[/b]Whenever Glint Armored Vigilant deals combat damage to a player, untap up to one target permanent you control.

Flash
When Silverbirch Walker enters, put up to one land from your hand onto the battlefield tapped under your control. If you control a creature with a moonlight counter on it, that land enters untapped instead.

Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has hexproof.
Sacrifice Radiant Masque: Equipped creature phases out. When that creature phases in, untap up to one target land you control. Activate only if Radiant Masque is attached to a creature.
Equip {2}
When you sacrifice Radiant Masque, you may return it to the battlefield transformed.
cards.rules_text2:
Amphitheater Grove enters tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}
cards.flavor_text2: [i]By seed and bone, the first of the masques was grown.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose target opponent. If they control a different number of lands than you, you may pay x, where X is equal to the difference. If you do, draw X cards. Otherwise, scry 2 then draw a card.
